answers.answer: If you are a woman, it may be sign that you are getting pregnant, but then the embryo dies very early for unknown reason and just gets absorbed by the body. The distorted smell, especially of sweat, can be a sign of pregnancy.On average  2/3 of all fertilized eggs die inside female body, and only 1/3 turn into full term pregnancy.Another reason for distorted smell could be diabetes.

question: For the past few years I have this intermittent smell of sweat that won't go away. Even after I take a shower or bath as soon as I dry off I can still smell this odor. I am not a sweaty person and I have good hygene.I asked my husband, my daughter, and my mother to smell me to see if maybe it was a Body odor problem I have and they all said that I smelled clean. It comes and it goes and lasts for days sometimes months at a time. I am so frustrated because I can't get rid of it and I constantly smell a sweaty odor. It makes me feel self-concious when it comes around and I don't know what to do. This is so embarrassing I hope by posting this that maybe someone out there can relate and get help too.
title: Smell of sweat that won't go away
